name: Tappy Souls
description:
This is originally an entry for our local game jam, decided to wrap it up and upload it.

Concept is very similar to nonstopknight, but with the mechanics of a darksouls game.

 Mechanics:

  • Souls like mechanics
  • when you die, you will spawn back to the last bonfire
  • when you die, you will loose your collected souls
  • casual attack pattern for bosses
  • 2 environment themes
  • 3 bosses
  • endless gameplay ( share how far you've gone up the levels! )

Screenshots:

we even got our own bonfire to boot! lol
